abstract: The Day: It is relatively rare for Andy Rooney's name to appear without "curmudgeon" lurking close by, and that is unfortunate. Also, what City Room is reading in other papers and blogs.
snippet: The Day: It is relatively rare for Andy Rooney's name to appear without "curmudgeon" lurking close by, and that is unfortunate. Also, what City Room is reading in other papers and blogs.
lead_paragraph: Have you ever wondered what Sundays would be like without Andy Rooney on "60 Minutes," inveighing against all manner of injustices and irritants, from the near-cosmic to the barely worth mentioning? If you have, and even if you haven't, you are about to find out. On Sunday night, Mr. Rooney delivered his last philippic after 33 years as a regular contributor to the CBS newsmagazine.
